channel.title: Command doesn't work

item.title: Command doesn't work
item.dc:creator: @Fabis Fabis
item.description:
@Fabis wrote:

I added this command above the command that teleports you to Home when you click the Emote button on emote tab:

[code] else if (command.startsWith(“help”)) {
helpmenu();
sendMessage(“You open the help menu.”);

        }
[/code]

But when i log in the game nothing happens. And i have the public void helpmenu(); thing at the beginning. I’ve been adding other commands too but they didn’t work. Whats wrong? Maybe the place where i add the commands?

Read full topic
